text:
For each filing of a Declaration of Domestic Partnership and each Amendment to a Declaration of Domestic Partnership the County Clerk shall charge a fee of $40. This fee may be adjusted pursuant to Section 
8.33.1(b) of this Code to reflect changes in the relevant Consumer Price Index as determined by the Controller. 
(Added by Ord. 2-91, App. 1/14/91; amended by Ord. 155-02, File No. 021079, App. 7/12/2002; Ord. 83-04, File No. 040102, App. 5/20/2004)
